Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We will now begin the <RED><MOJI0>
<MOJI2></RED>
competition!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please say hello to our four
contestants and their cows.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry No. 1
From <CHARANAME0> Farm, <CHARANAME1> and
<CHARANAME2>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry No. 2
From <CHARANAME0> Farm, <CHARANAME1> and
<CHARANAME2>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry No. 3
From <CHARANAME0> Farm, <CHARANAME1> and
<CHARANAME2>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry No. 4
From <CHARANAME0> Farm, <CHARANAME1> and
<CHARANAME2>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
And how about a big round of applause
for our judge, Neil.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi, I'm Neil. My standards are high, so
you better be prepared.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's move on to the competition. Please
wait while the judge makes his decision.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you for waiting. Now to 
announce the results.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
And the winner is...

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
From <CHARANAME0> Farm,
<BLUE><CHARANAME4></BLUE> and <CHARANAME2>!
Congratulations!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
And in second place is <CHARANAME1> and
their <MOJI0>, <CHARANAME2>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
In third place is <CHARANAME1> and
their <MOJI0>, <CHARANAME2>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
In fourth place is <CHARANAME1> and
their <MOJI0>, <CHARANAME2>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now it's time for the awards ceremony.
<CHARANAME4>, please step forward.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations! Here is your prize: 
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>. Please continue raising
your cows with loving care.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations! Here are your prizes:
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN> and
<GREEN><ITEMNAME1></GREEN>.
<PAGE>
Please continue raising your cows
with loving care.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations! Here are your prizes:
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN> and...
<PAGE>
<GREEN><ITEMNAME1></GREEN> and
<GREEN><ITEMNAME2></GREEN> blueprints.
Keep raising good cows.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you won. Good for you! For your
prize, you can choose between an item
or a cow from your desired region.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Which one do you want?
Cow
Item

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
All right. Here is your prize: 
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>. Please continue raising
your cows with loving care.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
All right. Here are your prizes:
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN> and
<GREEN><ITEMNAME1></GREEN>.
<PAGE>
Please continue raising your cows
with loving care.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
All right. Here are your prizes:
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN> and...
<PAGE>
<GREEN><ITEMNAME1></GREEN> and
<GREEN><ITEMNAME2></GREEN> blueprints.
Keep raising good cows.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
All right. Now give her a name.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you sure you happy with the
name <BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE>?
I am
Hold on

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right. I'll take her to your farm
later, <MYNAME>. Check in on her later,
and be sure to give her all your love.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sorry. You don't have any space at
your farm, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, fine. I'll just give you the
item instead. Here's your prize:
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, fine. I'll just give you the
items instead. Here are your prizes:
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN> and...
<PAGE>
<GREEN><ITEMNAME1></GREEN>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, fine. I'll just give you the
items instead. Here are your prizes:
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN> and...
<PAGE>
<GREEN><ITEMNAME1></GREEN> and
<GREEN><ITEMNAME2></GREEN> blueprints.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your milk's brand is now an
<RED>Unknown Brand</RED>. Keep aiming
for something better!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your milk's brand is now a
<RED>Popular Brand</RED>. Keep aiming
for something better!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Your milk's brand is now a
<RED>Top Brand</RED>. Don't get complacent,
and keep up the good work!

Compared to "No Brand" status, all your
milk and dairy product shipping prices
have gone up <BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE>!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This concludes the <RED><MOJI0>
<MOJI2></RED>.
Thank you all very much!
Beginners' Class
Intermediate Class
Advanced Class
Farm Area
Farm - West Forest
Farm - East Forest

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Which farm area will you raise her?
Cow
Jersey Cow
